response.overview: Raakh Aur Chingari is a Hindi film released in 1982, directed by S.U. Syed. The movie stars Vinod Mehra, Vidya Sinha, Anil Dhawan, and Asha Sachdev. While specific plot details are not extensively provided in the available context, the film is categorized under the social genre, suggesting it deals with social issues and themes.  The music for the film was composed by Ratandeep-Hemraaj, and the album includes six songs.
response.title: Raakh Aur Chingari
